name: redmine-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for comprehensive Redmine project management integration
long_description:
# Redmine MCP Server

A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to interact with Redmine project management systems. Provides access to issues, projects, time tracking, users, wiki pages, and more.

## Features

- **Issue Management**: Create, read, update, and delete issues
- **Project Management**: Access project details and versions
- **Time Tracking**: Log and manage time entries
- **User Management**: Access user information and memberships
- **Wiki Management**: Create and manage wiki pages
- **Utilities**: Search, custom requests, and status management

## Requirements

- Redmine instance with REST API enabled
- Valid API key or username/password credentials
- HTTPS recommended for production use

## Security

- API keys are stored securely in extension configuration
- All communication uses HTTPS when properly configured
- Input validation and sanitization on all requests

prompts.name: project_status
prompts.description: Get a comprehensive overview of project status
prompts.text:
Please provide a comprehensive overview of project ${arguments.project_id}. Include:
- Current project status and progress
- Open issues and their priorities
- Recent activity and updates
- Team members and their assignments
- Upcoming milestones and deadlines
- Any blockers or concerns

prompts.name: my_tasks
prompts.description: Show issues assigned to the current user
prompts.text:
Show me all issues currently assigned to me. Include:
- Issue priorities and statuses
- Due dates and deadlines
- Progress and completion status
- Project associations
- Recent updates or comments
Organize by priority and due date.

prompts.name: time_report
prompts.text:
Generate a detailed time tracking report for the period from ${arguments.from_date} to ${arguments.to_date}. Include:
- Total hours logged by project
- Time breakdown by activity type
- Daily/weekly time distribution
- Issues worked on and time spent
- Productivity insights and patterns
- Summary of accomplishments
